name: Aldo_Bonded_Leather_Reclining_Sofa
description: Don't let the fancy Italian name fool you. The Aldo reclining sofa is pure 100-percent American-style comfort. This reclining sofa possesses those subtle details desired for hours of uninhibited indulgence: Ultra smooth acorn toned bonded leather, foam-filled cushions and armrests, dual reclining seats. The Aldo reclining sofa perfectly blends into all home décor motifs.Set Includes: One (1) sofaMaterials: Bonded LeatherFill Material: 1.8 density foam encased pocked coil unit wrapped in decron fiberFinish: Acorn brownUpholstery Material: Bonded leatherUpholstery Color: Acorn brownSeating Comfort: MediumInner Dimensions: 19 inches tall x 22 inches wide x 20 inches deepOverall dimensions: 81 inches length x 39 inches width x 40 inches heightStyleContemporaryMaterialBonded LeatherTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
